title: New Space Mountain Song on 'Maine and Friends' Benefit Compilation
body:
An unreleased Space Mountain song is available on *[Maine and Friends for Maine](https://maine4maine.bandcamp.com/)*, a compilation album to benefit the COVID-19 Community Care Fund from **[Maine Initiatives](http://maineinitiatives.org/)**. Additionally, the organizer of the compilation is currently matching all proceeds to be donated to **[National Bail Out](https://nationalbailout.org/about/)**. 

Both organizations are doing vital work right now. **Maine Initiatives** is pooling resources for various grassroots organizations here in our (new) home state. **National Bail Out** is a Black-led group of organizers and activists assisting folks with bail funds, and building a movement to end pretrial detention and mass incarceration.
